gsw_content_information.article:
Update AWS Systems Manager Change Manager system properties, if required

Available Settings 

Description

Name of the Change Manager category to assign to AWS Change Template from AWS Systems Manager Change Manager

The setting correlates tot the Catalog item category in ServiceNow to which the synchronized AWS Change templates will be associated

Assignment Group (SYS_ID) to use when creating Change Requests from Change Template

The setting will automatically assign the change requests created from the change templates to the Assignment Group that relates to the sys_id

Defines the default role name the allows the Automation to perform the actions on your behalf. It is used only if the user does not fill in the “AutomationAssumeRole” field when requesting a change from AWS Systems Manager Change Manager. This value is case-sensitive and must exist in every account using the AWS Systems Manager Change Manager

The setting will contain the default role that will be used for creating change requests from AWS change templates.

Name of the CloudTrail lake (event data store) which holds events and resources associated with a change request. 

If left blank, CloudTrail events and resources associated with Change Requests will not be synchronized. If a name is supplied then an event data store with this name should be configured in each region that is enabled for AWS Systems Manager Change Manager

The maximum number of results to return from the event data store when syncing events and resources.

Default value: 1000

parent.display_value: Configure AWS Systems Manager Change Manager integration
